text: Ligue 1, officially known as Ligue 1 McDonald's for sponsorship reasons, is a professional association football league in France and the highest level of French football. The League is contested by 18 clubs and operates on a system of promotion and relegation from and to Ligue 2. ==Teams== ===List (2025–26 season)=== Club Location Venue Capacity Angers Angers Stade Raymond Kopa 18,752 Auxerre Auxerre Stade Abbé Deschamps 21,379 Brest Brest Stade Francis- Le Blé 15,931 Le Havre Le Havre Stade Océane 25,178 Lens Lens Stade Bollaert- Delelis 37,705 Lille Lille Decathlon Arena Pierre Mauroy Stadium 50,186 Lorient Lorient Stade du Moustoir 18,890 Lyon Lyon Groupama Stadium 59,186 Marseille Marseille Orange Vélodrome 67,394 Metz Metz Stade Saint-Symphorien 28,786 Monaco Monaco Stade Louis II 18,523 Nantes Nantes Stade de la Beaujoire 35,322 Nice Nice Allianz Riviera 35,624 Paris FC Paris Stade Sébastien Charléty 19,151 Paris Saint-Germain Paris Parc des Princes 47,926 Rennes Rennes Roazhon Park 29,778 Strasbourg Strasbourg Stade de la Meinau 29,230 Toulouse Toulouse Stadium de Toulouse 33,150 ==Champions== Club Titles Last win Paris Saint-Germain 13 2024–25 Saint-Étienne 10 1980–81 Marseille 9 2009–10 Monaco 8 2016–17 Nantes 8 2000–01 Lyon 7 2007–08 Bordeaux 6 2008–09 Reims 6 1961–62 Lille 4 2020–21 Nice 4 1958–59 Sochaux 2 1937–38 Sète 2 1938–39 Lens 1 1997–98 RC Paris 1 1935–36 Olympique Lillois 1 1932–33 Strasbourg 1 1978–79 Roubaix-Tourcoing 1 1946–47 Auxerre 1 1995–96 Montpellier 1 2011–12 ==Notes== ==References== ==Related pages== * Ligue 2 * Championnat National Category:1932 establishments in Europe Category:1930s establishments in France Category:Football leagues in France
